    ArrayList of ship Stores the ships in an Array List that is used by the game class

      • addShipName

        public void addShipName(java.lang.String shipName,
                        int xPos,
                        int yPos,
                        int noOfHitsMade,
                        int noOfHitsNeeded)
        Adding ships to the arrayList, taking the inputs from game class and saving it in an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        shipName - name of the individual ship
        xPos - the x position given by player
        yPos - the x position given by player
        noOfHitsmade - the number of hits made
        noOfHitsNeeded - the number of hits needed

      • checkIf1LifeLeft

        public boolean checkIf1LifeLeft(int xPos,
                                int yPos)
        Will check if the ship have 1 life left if one life is left then the ship will be destroyed
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position given by computer or player
        yPos - the x position given by computer or player
        Returns:
        returns true or false if x and y pos is the same as another ship

      • checkIfAllDestroyed

        public boolean checkIfAllDestroyed()
        checking if all ships are destroyed. If all are destroyed then the game ends
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position given by computer or player
        yPos - the x position given by computer or player
        Returns:
        returns true or false if x and y pos is the same as another ship

      • checkIfShipDamaged

        public boolean checkIfShipDamaged(int xPos,
                                  int yPos)
        Goal of this method is to check if the ship is damaged, if the ship is damaged then it changes into a D
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position given by computer or player
        yPos - the x position given by computer or player
        Returns:
        returns true if ship is damaged

      • checkPosition

        public boolean checkPosition(int xPos,
                             int yPos)
        Checking if the position is filled, if the position is filled the the computer needs to put the ship in another position
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position given by computer or player
        yPos - the x position given by computer or player
        Returns:
        returns true or false if x and y pos is the same as another ship

      • checkShipHit

        public boolean checkShipHit(int xPos,
                            int yPos)
        Checking if the computer or player hit a ship if it does not hit the ship, then it becomes false xPos and yPos comes from user input or computer input that is randomly generated
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position given by computer or player
        yPos - the x position given by computer or player
        Returns:
        returns true or false if x and y pos is the same as another ship
